Detailed Description

ioctl parameter for LNet fault simulation

Definition at line 47 of file lnetctl.h.

Field Documentation

__u32 lnet_fault_attr::fa_msg_mask

message types to drop, for example: dra_type = LNET_DROP_ACK_BIT | LNET_DROP_PUT_BIT

If it is non-zero then only specified message types are filtered, otherwise all message types will be checked.

Definition at line 72 of file lnetctl.h.

__u64 lnet_fault_attr::fa_ptl_mask

Portal mask to drop, -1 means all portals, for example: fa_ptl_mask = (1 << _LDLM_CB_REQUEST_PORTAL ) | (1 << LDLM_CANCEL_REQUEST_PORTAL).

If it is non-zero then only PUT and GET will be filtered, otherwise there is no portal filter, all matched messages will be checked.

Definition at line 64 of file lnetctl.h.
